verses.verse: Now there was a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of Ramathaimzophim,<WH7436> of mount<WH2022> Ephraim,<WH669> and his name<WH8034> was Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Elihu,<WH453> the son<WH1121> of Tohu,<WH8459> the son<WH1121> of Zuph,<WH6689> an Ephrathite:<WH673>

And when<WH834> she had weaned<WH1580> him, she took<WH5927> him up with her, with three<WH7969> bullocks,<WH6499> and one<WH259> ephah<WH374> of flour,<WH7058> and a bottle<WH5035> of wine,<WH3196> and brought<WH935> him to the house<WH1004> of the LORD<WH3068> in Shiloh:<WH7887> and the child<WH5288> was young.<WH5288>

And she said,<WH559> Oh<WH994> my lord,<WH113> as your soul<WH5315> lives,<WH2416> my lord,<WH113> I am the woman<WH802> that stood<WH5324> by you here,<WH2088> praying<WH6419> to the LORD.<WH3068>
